Articles.Content:
the commonwealth collapses under financial pressure

my moneyless armageddon

I create money

My monopolized wasteland

I earn all the money by winning the lottery

My fortune

you go bankrupt and i take all of your stuff in a auction

my stuff

You end up being found guilty of Fraud and put into jail for a year.

My jail keys

I regain all that money through petty theft.

My money (again)

You are arrested for trying to steal from a police officer and being pepper-sprayed.

My pepperspray

During this, I take the hill through a political coup.

My hill.

Oops, it's Turkey.

My country.

Edit: wait, political coup... oh well.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-14T00:11:21Z" title="12/14/2016 12:11  AM" data-short="7 yr">December 14, 2016</time> by The Raging Sandwich**

I kidnap you from the political coop and throw you into the chicken coop full of hungry hens. And since you're a sandwich, nice knowin' ya!

My hill once again.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-14T16:05:19Z" title="12/14/2016 04:05  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 14, 2016</time> by Xorth Tanovar**

I declare a war of colonization on you

my colony hill

The Vacuum Metastability Event happens, wiping everything from existence including the hill!

Non-Existant me now owns the Non-existant Hill.

I invoke the Time Lord's Ultimate Sanction, TIme no longer exists.

My timeless hill

I use the moment, Time Lords no longer exist

My wibbly wobbly timey wimey hill

ps: who's your favourite doctor [@Xorth Tanovar](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/71205-xorth-tanovar/)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-16T22:12:48Z" title="12/16/2016 10:12  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 16, 2016</time> by Kosmonaut**

I again reassert Kerbal Space Program as the dominant default realityset for this universe, thus deleting time lords, moments, wimey balls, and such.

I claim Mt. Whoopstooshort, which seems to be the name of the mountain range immediately to the West of Kerbal Space Center.

My mountain... and somewhat repaired Universe#27.

i take over the universe in a hostile military coup

my universe 27

and the mountain...

ill use spoiler for people who haven't seen rouge one yet...see, i care about you!

Spoiler

i use the death star to blow it up like that desert city and the oceanside imperial place that looks like cape Canaveral...

my piece of ruble that used to be the mountain

I steal the rubble and place it in my pocket.

My rubble.

[@Kosmonaut](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/137785-kosmonaut/), if it's the older series, it's a close race between Jon Pertwee and Tom Baker. New series, I kinda liked Chris Eccleston (he was just quirky enough)
I kill everbody in the forum during the night and build an indestructable hill guarded by a space fleet and other awesome things. MY HILL!!!!!

I'm not a "body," I'm a sandwich. Due to me being a sandwich, I easily sneak into your hill and utterly destroy you.

And if someone defeats me by eating me I will find you!

I cook you in the toasted cheese sandwich too long and simply throw you in the recycling bin where you are desintigrated for not being recyclable

My Hill

Better than being eaten if you ask me

I go all Toy Story 3 and end up being given to a toddler.

My loving owner of an expired sandwich.

Sandwich gets eaten by the toddler's dad, Homer Simpson.

My hill
I use Chikennator to make from Homer A Chiken!

...which I proceed to cook and eat.

> 
> 
> On 12/22/2016 at 6:19 PM, RandomGuy1824 said:
> 
> 
> build an indestructable hill guarded by a space fleet and other awesome things.
> 

I then draw the attention of [@RandomGuy1824](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/172757-randomguy1824/)'s security force; they recognize all of us as intruders and blast you all to bits (I leave)

I reconstruct [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/), give [@RandomGuy1824](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/172757-randomguy1824/) his hill back, and ask for alliance with both.

I leave universe [Redacted] to visit universe 27. I quickly grab any friendlies and leave. I return bringing The Reality Bomb! I set it to go off as some as I leave. Then I leave!  Congrats Universe #27 is now nothing. My empire calmly waiting for me and my friendlies. [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) and allies? I hope you're cool splitting the Caucasian mountains between yourselves!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-28T05:58:07Z" title="12/28/2016 05:58  AM" data-short="7 yr">December 28, 2016</time> by ThaZeus**
